forum.content:
It’s funny how things work out, in this life
Just seem like I just can’t, can’t feel right
Of waking up next to her, in this hotel room
Staring at her sleeping face, fresh and
Not knowing how can I go,
Asking where we were broken
Cause I want a brand new beginning with you

[Chorus]
Can we go back, wanna rewind
I miss the good days, we had to say goodbye
I know that, I messed up, my heart’s in trouble
We had to say goodbye

I’m missin all your good walk, into my room
Or with the flash or your pretty smile, you can my wounds
I like the good days and all the feelings that she do
Even if love, I miss there
Not knowing how can I go,
Asking where we were broken
Cause I want a brand new beginning with you

[Chorus]
Can we go back, wanna rewind
I miss the good days, we had to say goodbye
I know that, I messed up, my heart’s in trouble
We had to say goodbye

I know that, you needed space
Need one more time, just to see your face
They say to let it go, when you come expect of you
When you really know

[Chorus]
Can we go back, wanna rewind
I miss the good days, we had to say goodbye
I know that, I messed up, my heart’s in trouble
We had to say goodbye
Have to say goodbye, whoa, whoa, whoa.

urls.description:
"GoodBye"- The 1st single off the forthcoming EP "Love, Life, and Stereo"

Produced by G2
Written by
urls.title: Maurice - Goodbye

forum.title: Good bye
